title: Review - Jordan B Peterson 12 More Rules - Washington, DC - February 22, 2022 - The Lens of Value
description:
A few reflections on the present tour of our "old friend"

Shedler on Boyce: https://youtu.be/g94xRvvu0oc
Peterson's Freud lecture: https://youtu.be/YFWLwYyrMRE
